shortdesc.ph: Occurs each time the SDK receives a video frame and prompts you to set the video format.

section.p: 如果你想获取 420 格式以外的视频数据，需要在调用 方法时注册该回调。 After you successfully register the video frame observer, the SDK triggers this callback each time it receives a video frame. You need to set your preferred video data in the return value of this callback.

section.title: Returns
section.p:
设置 SDK 输出的原始数据格式 ：
(0)：（默认） YUV420 格式。
(2)： RGBA 格式。
